mapper.sql: SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_SELLCOUNT, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DCPRICE, ITEM_TOTALCOUNT, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_BASKETIMG, ITEM_DETAILIMG, ITEM_REMAINCOUNT FROM PET_ITEM
mapper.select: select a.* from (select row_number() over (partition by item_type order by item_sellcount desc) as sellcount , item_type , item_sellcount, item_no, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_TOTALCOUNT, ITEM_DETAILIMG, ITEM_DCPRICE, ITEM_BASKETIMG, ITEM_REMAINCOUNT from pet_item ) a where a.item_type = #{isSearch} and a.sellcount <5 order by a.item_type , a.sellcount

select a.* from (select row_number() over (partition by item_type order by item_sellcount desc) as sellcount , item_type , item_sellcount, item_no, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_TOTALCOUNT, ITEM_DETAILIMG, ITEM_DCPRICE, ITEM_BASKETIMG, ITEM_REMAINCOUNT from pet_item ) a where a.sellcount =1 order by a.item_type
SELECT ITEM_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL as ITEM_NO FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: insert into pet_item (ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DCPRICE, ITEM_TOTALCOUNT, ITEM_SELLCOUNT, ITEM_REMAINCOUNT, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_DETAILIMG, ITEM_BASKETIMG) values( #{ITEM_NO}, #{ITEM_NAME}, #{ITEM_PRICE}, #{ITEM_DCPRICE}, #{ITEM_TOTALCOUNT}, 0, #{ITEM_TOTALCOUNT}, #{ITEM_TYPE}, #{ITEM_IMG}, #{ITEM_DETAILIMG}, #{ITEM_BASKETIMG})
mapper.update: update PET_ITEM set ITEM_NAME = #{ITEM_NAME}, ITEM_PRICE = #{ITEM_PRICE}, ITEM_DCPRICE = #{ITEM_DCPRICE}, ITEM_REMAINCOUNT = #{ITEM_REMAINCOUNT}, ITEM_TYPE = #{ITEM_TYPE}, ITEM_IMG = #{ITEM_IMG}, ITEM_DETAILIMG = #{ITEM_DETAILIMG}, ITEM_BASKETIMG = #{ITEM_BASKETIMG}
